About Me

I am a self-motivated, reliable and trustworthy person with great interpersonal skills. I am committed individual able to work well under pressure both within a team and when using my own initiative.

I have great organisational skills demonstrated through prioritising my work effectively and planning ahead both for peer, managerial and personal benefits.

I have a passion for design and development especially within the tech space. Overall I am a friendly, hardworking, considerate, and imperative member of any team.
